lead_paragraph: Investigators have found the remains of four people presumed to be gold miners missing more than a week in Venezuela’s southern jungle.

headline.main: Venezuela: 4 Bodies Found in Case of 21 Gold Miners Missing in Jungle
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: 4 Bodies Found in Case Of 21 Gold Miners Missing in Jungle

snippet: Investigators have found the remains of four people presumed to be gold miners missing more than a week in Venezuela’s southern jungle.
